sentences.en: However, for some applications, lots of grids and poles may be overkill.
sentences.cn: 但是对于某些应用程序, 过多的格线和标杆则具有破坏性.

sentences.en: However, one would suffice; the ribs themselves are tasty enough without sauce overkill.
sentences.cn: 其实, 只需一种酱料即可,因为即使干吃, 排骨也是非常美味的.

sentences.en: If you have a three page web site, Zope is overkill.
sentences.cn: 如果你的web站点只有3个页面, 用Zope就是杀鸡用牛刀了.

sentences.en: It was surely overkill to screen three interviews on the same subject in one evening.
sentences.cn: 一晚放映叁个同一主题的访问记实,真是小题大做.

sentences.en: Overkill - why is it the pre - req to mutilate?
sentences.cn: 斩尽杀绝 —— 为什么这是毁伤的前 置 天赋?

sentences.en: Search engine visibility can also suffer badly from web designer overkill.
sentences.cn: 如果你的网站太“绚丽多彩”,对于搜索引擎搜录网站来说也会产生非常不利的影响.

sentences.en: She has beautiful eyes, but the make - up was overkill.
sentences.cn: 她的眼睛很漂亮, 但是她化的妆太浓了.

sentences.en: Sometimes overkill with flash just amounts to a big distraction.
sentences.cn: 有时候过分使用动画,反而会喧宾夺主.

sentences.en: Such security measures may well be overkill.
sentences.cn: 这样的安保措施很可能过头了。

sentences.en: That is enough, anymore is just overkill.
sentences.cn: 够了, 再多一点也是多余的了.
那就够了, 再多一点也是多余的.

sentences.en: The feature is certainly overkill for normal users, but there are those who appreciate such flexibility.
sentences.cn: 对于普通用户,这种方式当然是不太必要了, 不过还是有一些人喜欢这样的灵活.

sentences.en: The outfit was cute, but the accessories were overkill.
sentences.cn: 这套外衣很好看, 只是配件太多了.

sentences.en: There is a danger of overkill if you plan everything too carefully.
sentences.cn: 如果事事过分谨小慎微，那结果难免有适得其反的危险。

sentences.en: We do not desire excessive forces, or what some people have called overkill.
sentences.cn: 我们并不需要拥有过份的武力, 即有些人所说的“超过需要的杀戮能力”.
